item.description:
Back roads ride to Pie in the Sky Restaurant and Bakery located in historic Woods Hole, at the end of the Shining Sea Bike Path

Lunch features a delicious assortment of handmade croissants, pies, cookies, popovers, and breads, all baked from scratch on the premises. There are hearty, made to order sandwiches together with homemade soups, quiche, and salads

If there is time we can go to the aquarium or Oceanographic Institute.

Meeting time:  9 am at Dunkin Donuts in Pembroke

                      930 am ride leaves

Second Meeting Location: 

 Dunkin Donuts 9:30 AM
24 Meeting House Lane
Bourne MA
(Exit 1A off route 3 just before Sagamore Bridge)
This is a quick stop to pick up second group!!!! Please arrive here promptly!

Gas: across street at both locations. Arrive with a full tank!

Please let me know if you plan to be at the 2nd location.

Woods Hole parking is very tight and mostly metered parking.  We will be trying to park at a bank parking lot but in the event we have trouble locating enough parking there is a trolley that runs every half hour from the Falmouth Mall into Woods Hole.  Cost for the day is $6 each.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Pie in the Sky
